bug.author: bee-san
bug.summary: AuSearch could not find any solutions
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>‚ûú poetry run ciphey -t "aGVsbG8gbXkgbmFtZSB" Traceback (most recent call last): File "<string>", line 1, in <module> File "/home/bee/.cache/pypoetry/virtualenvs/ciphey-MhwK4__h-py3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/click/core.py", line 829, in __call__ return self.main(*args, **kwargs) File "/home/bee/.cache/pypoetry/virtualenvs/ciphey-MhwK4__h-py3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/click/core.py", line 782, in main rv = self.invoke(ctx) File "/home/bee/.cache/pypoetry/virtualenvs/ciphey-MhwK4__h-py3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1066, in invoke return ctx.invoke(self.callback, **ctx.params) File "/home/bee/.cache/pypoetry/virtualenvs/ciphey-MhwK4__h-py3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/click/core.py", line 610, in invoke return callback(*args, **kwargs) File "/home/bee/Documents/Ciphey/ciphey/__main__.py", line 250, in main print(decrypt(config, kwargs["text"])) File "/home/bee/Documents/Ciphey/ciphey/__main__.py", line 40, in decrypt res: iface.SearchResult = config.objs["searcher"].search(ctext) File "/home/bee/Documents/Ciphey/ciphey/basemods/Searchers/ausearch.py", line 162, in search raise LookupError("Could not find any solutions") LookupError: Could not find any solutions </denchmark-code>
Can we get something nicer?

This is so sad. Can we hit 50 pull requests? Maybe I could make the Searcher interface return Optional[...] so that we could handle this more pleasantly? This specific error can actually be fixed if we filter out empty strings from the brandon checker (would recommend)
